biotools.summary: Takes one or more protein sequences as input and analyzes them in a five-step process during which searches for sequence homologues, analyses of multiple sequence alignments, and hierarchical relationships between protein subfamilies are performed.

bioschemas.name: PipeAlign2
bioschemas.summary: Takes one or more protein sequences as input and analyzes them in a five-step process during which searches for sequence homologues, analyses of multiple sequence alignments, and hierarchical relationships between protein subfamilies are performed.
